main event: A UFO was sighted in Englewood, Ohio on October 28, 1956, appearing circular with a bluish trail and observed circling in the sky.
interesting points: The object was initially estimated to be 50 miles away but later re-estimated at 500 miles away., The observation lasted for 15 minutes., Witnesses thought the object might be a meteor due to its brilliant color and circular motion., The object changed color during the observation, appearing pink at times., Observers indicated possible lightning as a contributing factor to the sighting.
sighted object: One circular object with a bluish trail
witness description: Witness was in a car and described observing the object circling in the west-southwest direction.
